articles.description: Aston Villa news includes Premier League frustrated 'Big Six' set to plead with AVFC and other clubs opposing Project Restart plan
articles.content:
The Premier League's 'Big Six' will plead with relegation-threatened clubs to change their mind on Project Restart at Monday's meeting.
Aston Villa are among the clubs to have voiced their opposition to the plan to finish the season by playing the remaining … [+1848 chars]

articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: EFL: Rotherham chairman expects League One and League Two to be cancelled - Sky Sports
articles.description: Rotherham chairman Tony Stewart says he would be "amazed" if the League One and League Two seasons are not cancelled.
articles.content:
Rotherham chairman Tony Stewart expects a decision to be made on the fate of the League One and League Two seasons by Thursday and would be "amazed" if they are not cancelled.
The English Football League is due to meet later this week and it has been widely … [+1790 chars]

articles.description: Fergie had ultimate faith in his coaches
articles.content:

articles.title: Philippe Coutinho transfer stance suggests he's changed his opinion on Liverpool - Mirror Online
articles.description: Philippe Coutinho completed a £142m transfer to Barcelona in 2018, but fell down the pecking order at an alarming rate in Spain and was sent out on loan in 2019
articles.content:
Philippe Coutinho found himself on Barcelona's scrapheap in the summer of 2019.
 The Brazilian, who had only completed a £142million transfer from Liverpool in January 2018, had fallen down the pecking order at an alarming rate in Spain.

articles.title: Atletico Madrid 'offer Thomas Partey to Liverpool in Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain swap deal' - Mirror Online
articles.description: Atletico Madrid and Liverpool could be involved in summer transfer action with the Spaniards keen to swap Thomas Partey for Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
articles.content:
Atletico Madrid are eyeing a move for Liverpool's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and are prepared to offer Thomas Partey in exchange.
The Ghanaian was part of the Atletico side that won 3-2 at Anfield back in March.
